events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and are excited to review your qualifications.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department, specifically for the software development team.
A dedicated recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to assist you with your application process.
The initial screening of your resume and skills has been completed successfully, and we would like to move forward.
Thank you for your prompt response to our invitation. We appreciate your enthusiasm for the engineering role.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 10 AM UTC with one of our senior software engineers.
